gameInfo.controlsInfo: To move as the ShootAvatar, use the arrow keys to turn and move. Press space to use the shovel (OrientedFlicker).

winRules.text: If time reaches 1000 seconds, then you will win.

loseRules.text: If zombie (shooters) and goal (Door) collide, then the zombie (shooters) sprite will be transformed into eatenBrains (static).
If the eatenBrains (static) sprite reaches 1 then you lose.
If there are no more avatar (ShootAvatar) sprites then you will lose.

pointsRules.text: If the zombie (shooters) and the pea (bullets) collide, then you will gain 1 point.
